str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A way, road, journey, path. Apparently a primary word; a road; by implication, a progress; figuratively, a mode or means.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A bird, fowl. Neuter of a derivative of petomai; a flying animal, i.e. Bird.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To eat up, eat till it is finished, devour, squander, annoy, injure. From kata and esthio; to eat down, i.e. Devour.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
